name: Formula Car Racing Simulator
description:
Go bumper to bumper with intelligent rivals racers in Formula car racing simulator.

Feel the rush as you tear down the track at reckless speed in a thrilling car race to the finish.

Play it to believe it.

Features:

* Addictive Game play.

* Simple and Easy controls.

* Compete against AI driver from around the world.

* 30 Racing tracks more coming soon....

* Visually Stunning Realistic 3D Graphics.

* Customize Car Paint to match your personality.
publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private
